COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e
STRING: I got to the front of the Cenacolo, and hesitated slightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: I had to pretend I had somewhere to go in front of
Torta and I'd made it this far, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a
STRING: When I came with Asino before, I thought I had
understood all to well that this was futile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0
STRING: I stood in front of the door and could hear the noise
from inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: Just listening to that, I couldn't help but feel how
different I was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: Regardless, I was losing my willingness to enter that
crowd of people alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8
STRING: Thinking I'd go home today, I turned around to notice
someone looking at me in a place away from the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x212
STRING: [???] “What's this? Aren't you going in?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x228
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e
STRING: I was flustered at the sudden intrusion, but managed an
answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286
STRING: Speaking with a calm tone and expression, she nodded
slowly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292
STRING: But for some reason, she didn't move away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Chris] “Um, do you need something...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: After saying this, I realized I was standing in front of the
door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I'm in your way. Sorry about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f2
STRING: [???] “No, don't worry about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x320
STRING: But are you really not going in?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336
STRING: [Chris] “In here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368
STRING: [???] “Yeah. I thought you were going in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e
STRING: [Chris] “No... Maybe. Were you watching me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b0
STRING: [???] “Yes, for a little while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c6
STRING: Back to my old habits again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d2
STRING: I wanted to fix it, but didn't think it could be fixed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de
STRING: I had to get it under control, though.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ea
STRING: At least in front of people who I didn't know very well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f6
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry for getting in your way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40c
STRING: I liked people like that, who talked modestly, and had
an air of reserve.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x422
STRING: But I couldn't very well stand in her way while she was
trying to get inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: I had already lost the desire to go in myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44e
STRING: [Chris] “I'll be going, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49a
STRING: As I turned around to walk away, I heard a small voice
behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b0
STRING: I was a little embarrassed and not very used to that kind
of thing, so I may have been a little cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: I thought I should turn around and say something, but
stopped myself and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x530
STRING: I stopped for a bit in front of the Cenacolo, which
served as a lounge for the students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x546
STRING: I almost never came here and honestly had no good
memories of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: But I told myself that it was just the place I could use at
a time like this, and opened the door decisively.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: Several students who were performing inside stopped
their playing and looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e8
STRING: Maybe they thought I was someone they knew?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: Most everyone that came here this early in the morning
were probably serious students and had private lessons
in the morning like myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x614
STRING: I, however, did not set up morning lessons because I
was a serious student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62a
STRING: [Chris] “Morning...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x640
STRING: I nodded to them in greeting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64c
STRING: I'd seen one of them before somewhere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: Most likely a Fortelle student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x664
STRING: I realized again how little connection I had with other
students, and looked around the room for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: The students who seemed to know me looked my way,
talked amongst themselves, and immediately started
playing again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69a
STRING: They must have realized it would be useless to try and
talk to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b0
STRING: That being the case, I should have taken the initiative
and said something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6bc
STRING: I knew that, but for some reason I didn't want to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d2
STRING: Just as their judgment was correct, my intuition about it
was also probably right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71a
STRING: The number of people steadily increased; the ones
playing and the ones conversing gradually splitting into
two groups.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x730
STRING: Then there was me, doing neither, standing there like a
wallflower.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x746
STRING: I asked myself why I was here, and remembered I had
come to look for a partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: Having to pretend I had somewhere to go in front of
Torta was basically the only reason I came here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: Faced with the fact of how much of an outsider I was
and having already lost the will to look, I started
thinking this was a waste of time, but then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: I met the gaze of a female student across from me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b0
STRING: [???] “Are you, um, waiting for someone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e2
STRING: She came over looking slightly hesitant, and asked in a
shy voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f8
STRING: [Chris] “No... I'm not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80e
STRING: I was flustered by the sudden interaction, but managed
to answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x824
STRING: I kind of liked her modest way of speaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: [???] “Oh, I see.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x866
STRING: Then, why are you here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x872
STRING: She got that far, and then stopped as if interrupted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x888
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, I was just about to leave.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89e
STRING: I thought it might be good to talk to her a bit more, but
I also really did not want to stay much longer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b4
STRING: [Chris] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f8
STRING: Saying this, I went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: The rain was a little stronger than normal that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x940
STRING: That's why I wasn't in a very good mood.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94c
STRING: It was just normal in the morning; when did it get so
strong?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x962
STRING: It wasn't the usual light drizzle, but rather, big drops of
water visible to the naked eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x978
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe I'll wait a little longer...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98e
STRING: I stood in the entryway, just out of reach of the rain, and
gazed into space.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c4
STRING: As I stood there thinking about what to do, my field of
view suddenly darkened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa10
STRING: [???] “Would you like to share?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa26
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5c
STRING: At some point I had moved slightly into the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa68
STRING: My bangs were wet, and so were my shoulders.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa74
STRING: And there was an umbrella over my head, out of the
blue, which made me aware of just how wet I was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8a
STRING: I noticed for the first time that I was standing in the rain
when it stopped hitting me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa0
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab6
STRING: At a loss for words, I just gazed in silence at the
umbrella.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac2
STRING: Of course, they sold umbrellas at the general store,
though I rarely saw people using them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad8
STRING: But since coming here, this may have been my first time
actually standing under an umbrella.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: Realizing that of course someone had to be holding the
umbrella, I turned my head to look.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: For a moment I thought it might have been Torta, but
soon learned I was wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb32
STRING: [Chris] “You are...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb50
STRING: [???] “I haven't introduced myself, have I? My name is
Falsita. Falsita Fawcett.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: She smiled at me with the umbrella held out at an
angle, then tilted her head, still smiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8e
STRING: [Chris] “Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbac
STRING: [Fal] “No. Shall we talk as we walk?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc2
STRING: [Chris] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4a
STRING: I still didn't know why I was under the umbrella of
someone I didn't know, or why I was walking with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc60
STRING: The sound of the rain hitting the umbrella was different
than on the pavement. It was surprisingly soft.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc76
STRING: I introduced myself as we walked, and we were silent
for a long time afterward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: [Fal] “Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: [Chris] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: I was holding the umbrella, so her hands were free.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce8
STRING: I didn't have any ulterior motives or expectations.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf4
STRING: I knew I wasn't that kind of person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd00
STRING: I just didn't want someone to have to hold an umbrella
for me as I walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd32
STRING: [Fal] “Did I come on a little too strong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: She said this slightly bemusedly and slowed her pace.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: Before she stopped walking altogether, I made sure to
continue talking in the hope that this would keep her
going.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6a
STRING: [Chris] “No, not at all. It's just rare for me to be under
an umbrella.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda6
STRING: [Fal] “Really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd4
STRING: I guess you're right, though.
Most people in this city don't use umbrellas.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdea
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, but... thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1c
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, you don't have to thank me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe32
STRING: [Chris] “But, why were you there? Were you waiting for
someone at the Cenacolo?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6e
STRING: [Fal] “Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe84
STRING: After showing some reluctance, she continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb6
STRING: [Fal] “You looked a little uncomfortable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: [Chris] “Me...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefe
STRING: [Fal] “Yeah. So I went outside thinking you were sick,
and saw you looking up at the rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1e
STRING: [Chris] “Is that right...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf34
STRING: I gripped the umbrella tighter and continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf40
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: [Fal] “Of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf74
STRING: She passed off my gratitude with a little nod.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf80
STRING: [Chris] “But, is that really all? Have I met you
somewhere before?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa0
STRING: I brought up the subject to try and cover up my slight
embarrassment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb6
STRING: And it was true that I'd felt that way a little since
hearing her name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfcc
STRING: Nevertheless, her mild manner and refined features left
an impression, and I probably wouldn't have forgotten
her if I'd actually met her in class.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: I was at least sure that I hadn't met her in Fortelle class.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: And I couldn't think of any situations where I might have
run into her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1018
STRING: [Chris] “No... I must be mistaken.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102e
STRING: She just listened with a smile as I added this entirely like
an excuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1044
STRING: Then she smiled modestly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106c
STRING: [Fal] “We may have met somewhere.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: [Chris] “May have...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a0
STRING: [Fal] “I'm not sure, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b6
STRING: [Chris] “That means?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: [Fal] “If you've been properly attending school functions,
there's a good chance we've met before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1108
STRING: [Chris] “School functions... I don't really go all the time. I
never go if I'm not required to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113a
STRING: [Fal] “Really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1168
STRING: Hee-hee, still, we may have seen each
other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: I was class president up until last spring.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ac
STRING: [Chris] “Really? Oh, I think I'm starting to remember...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c2
STRING: I thought I had met her at some kind of function and
said a greeting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ce
STRING: Because I wasn't really paying attention to the
conversation, all I remembered was that someone was
talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e4
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: [Fal] “Why are you sorry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: [Chris] “Because I'm not a serious student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: [Fal] “Hee-hee, don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: She said this with an elegant demeanor, as she had
done several times already.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128a
STRING: It sounded so natural, like she really meant it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1296
STRING: If you said she was suited to be the class president of a
school attended by many children of aristocrats and the
upper class, you'd be right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ac
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d6
STRING: We had just arrived at the boundary between the main
street and the Old District.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... My place is in the Old District... I just
walked here without thinking...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131e
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134c
STRING: Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1358
STRING: [Chris] “No... I was just thinking that your place might
not be in the Old District, Miss Falsita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: [Fal] “It's no problem. I live here, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1396
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: I thought she lived in the New District, where there
were a lot of houses belonging to aristocrats and the
upper class.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13de
STRING: She had an air about her that didn't suit the Old District
and its cheap apartments.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: [Fal] “Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: [Chris] “No... It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143c
STRING: That wasn't something to ask someone I'd just met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: I decided to leave it alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1470
STRING: [Fal] “I see. Ah... Also, you don't have to be so formal,
call me Fal. All my friends call me that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149a
STRING: [Chris] “Miss... Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b0
STRING: I didn't really think the two of us would become close,
but she asked me, so I couldn't refuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c6
STRING: Even so, I couldn't just use her nickname... I clumsily
stuck “Miss” on the front.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f8
STRING: [Fal] “Mm-hmm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1542
STRING: Since our way home was the same, I continued walking
under her umbrella.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157c
STRING: [Fal] “So Chris, you're a Fortelle student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1592
STRING: We were students at the same school, so the
conversation naturally went this way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ba
STRING: [Fal] “Amazing. So you have the ability.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d0
STRING: [Chris] “No... Not so much. It was just a coincidence,
nothing amazing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160c
STRING: [Fal] “Do you... Do you really think so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1622
STRING: [Chris] “I really do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1654
STRING: [Fal] “That's pretty... rare.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166a
STRING: She said that, sounding like it was neither good nor
bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169c
STRING: [Fal] “That reminds me,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ca
STRING: you're a third-year student,
right Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d6
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I am... How did you know that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f4
STRING: [Fal] “You performed at the concert hall a little while
ago, right? At the summer concert.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: There were three seasonal concerts a year at the
school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1720
STRING: So many students performed, I am pretty sure there was
no way to see all the performances.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1736
STRING: Which meant...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1742
STRING: [Chris] “Are you perchance a Fortelle student, Miss Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1762
STRING: If that was the case, it would have been a very rude
thing to ask. There was no way I shouldn't remember
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1794
STRING: [Fal] “No, I'm a voice student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c2
STRING: But I watched all
the Fortelle performances.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d8
STRING: [Chris] “Did you have to watch them all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180a
STRING: [Fal] “No I didn't,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: but I enjoyed them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: [Chris] “I always just leave when my part is over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1876
STRING: [Fal] “That's what I thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188c
STRING: She smiled in agreement, as if she had begun to
understand me a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a2
STRING: I didn't find that unpleasant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ae
STRING: [Chris] “But... You're a voice student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c4
STRING: The idea I suddenly had then didn't seem very realistic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d0
STRING: She seemed popular, and I was sure she already had a
partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1902
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I wanted to ask you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1930
STRING: Do you already
have a partner, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1946
STRING: Just as I was giving up on asking her, she suddenly
asked me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...? No, not yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198e
STRING: [Fal] “That's good. I actually don't have a partner yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c6
STRING: Would you like to play together sometime?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19dc
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fa
STRING: [Fal] “I know you can't decide right away, so I was
thinking it would be good if we could perform together
sometime.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1a
STRING: [Chris] “Uhh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a30
STRING: I felt like she had planned this a little too well, but I
couldn't see a reason to refuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a46
STRING: We could see if our music and personalities matched or
not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a5c
STRING: [Chris] “But... Are you sure?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8e
STRING: [Fal] “Am I sure?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1abc
STRING: I'm the one asking you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad2
STRING: [Chris] “Um... If we're just trying out for now, I should
be asking you. I don't have a partner yet and was in the
middle of looking for one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b18
STRING: [Fal] “Just as I thought. You were at the Cenacolo, so I
figured that was it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b38
STRING: As she said this, it was time for us to part ways.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b44
STRING: [Chris] “Um, I'm this way...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b76
STRING: [Fal] “Ah, I'm that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8c
STRING: She said this with a slight look of disappointment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb4
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, but let me walk you to your door. I'd feel bad
if I brought you this far just to let you get wet now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd4
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's close so I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf2
STRING: [Fal] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c08
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. Um, about what we were saying; when
should we meet?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c44
STRING: [Fal] “I'm busy this week, so from next week would be
better.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c64
STRING: [Chris] “Any time next week?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c96
STRING: [Fal] “No, sorry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: Just Tuesday and Thursday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce8
STRING: Then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d16
STRING: I'm free on Sunday...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d22
STRING: [Chris] “Tuesday or Thursday is fine... I don't want to go
to school on my day off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5e
STRING: [Fal] “Ah-ha-ha. I thought you'd say that, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8c
STRING: What time do you have lessons?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da2
STRING: [Chris] “The second period. So I'm finished in the
morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd4
STRING: [Fal] “I'm first period, so how about around noon?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dea
STRING: [Chris] “Do you mind if I eat first?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e08
STRING: [Fal] “Of course not. I'll reserve a practice room around
that time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e40
STRING: The place should be...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4c
STRING: She tilted her head as if in thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e74
STRING: [Fal] “To make it easy to find, how about the practice
room at the very end of the hall?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e94
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, sure. But we didn't decide Tuesday or
Thursday...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb2
STRING: [Fal] “I'll be in the practice room regardless. I always
practice there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed2
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, that's right... You're a serious student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f04
STRING: [Fal] “Actually, there are people who practice much
more than I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f24
STRING: [Chris] “Still, it's very you, Miss Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f56
STRING: [Fal] “Very... me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6c
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f82
STRING: That wasn't something to say to someone I'd just met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8e
STRING: [Chris] “Just a gut feeling.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc0
STRING: [Fal] “I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd6
STRING: She just said that and laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe2
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... See you on Tuesday or Thursday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2000
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. See you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2024
STRING: With a graceful bow goodbye, she turned to leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2030
STRING: I hurriedly called out to her from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x203c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh! Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206e
STRING: [Fal] “Yes? What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2084
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you for the umbrella.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b6
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, you don't have to thank me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2116
STRING: After parting ways with Miss Fal, I ran down the road
that would normally be a three-minute walk, and
returned home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x212c
STRING: My hair and clothes didn't end up getting that wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216e
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, welcome home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2184
STRING: I was out of breath, so I paused for a moment before
answering.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21cc
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? Did you run?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e2
STRING: [Chris] “A little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2214
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, did something happen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222a
STRING: [Chris] “Sort of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2240
STRING: I decided to explain later, and moved from the entryway
into the room for now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2272
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh? You don't need to wipe off with the
towel today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2288
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not that wet. I guess I need to explain that,
too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c4
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f2
STRING: Well? Tell me what happened!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22fe
STRING: Phorni asked with great interest, and I told her about
the day's events, as I always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x237c
STRING: [Phorni] “Ooh, an umbrella. That's pretty rare.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2392
STRING: [Chris] “I thought so too, but it's also kind of... normal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ce
STRING: [Phorni] “That could be true, but... She's weird.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e4
STRING: [Chris] “Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2416
STRING: [Phorni] “She's too nice to you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x242c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm pretty sure she would find some irony in you
calling her weird, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2468
STRING: [Phorni] “What's that mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247e
STRING: [Chris] “Being called weird by someone with wings and
calling herself a fairy...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ba
STRING: [Phorni] “Aah! That's mean!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d0
STRING: [Chris] “You're the one that called her weird. Serves you
right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ee
STRING: [Phorni] “That's not true. I'm not weird.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2504
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha. Yeah-yeah, you're not weird. And
neither is Miss Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2540
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm, you're awfully defensive about her...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2556
STRING: [Chris] “Not at all. I just think she's nice for lending me
her umbrella.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2592
STRING: [Phorni] “Humph... So you're happy because someone
happened to treat you nicely.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25b2
STRING: After a brief pensive expression, she nodded as if she
understood something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c8
STRING: [Chris] “That's not quite it. I don't really know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25de
STRING: It was hard to put into words, so I said it ambiguously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ea
STRING: Just as I thought she would keep pressing me with
questions...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261c
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2632
STRING: Phorni tilted her head, as if she was still thinking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2664
STRING: Telling Phorni what happened during the day like this
was already a daily routine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267a
STRING: She didn't want to go outside, but always wanted to
hear me talk about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2692
STRING: Fairies are mysterious creatures; even after living with
one for almost three years, I didn't fully understand
them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a8
STRING: She could touch things, but didn't get wet in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26b4
STRING: She didn't eat anything, and could sing and sing without
getting tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ca
STRING: She floated, but couldn't fly, and she could appear and
disappear at will.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e0
STRING: Despite defying the laws of physics, she couldn't get up
high and was always bugging me for a hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26f8
STRING: But... Leaving a towel by the door after I left in the
morning became Phorni's job at some point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270e
STRING: In short, it was impossible to think about Phorni
logically. If you could accept her for what she was, it
was quite fun.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272e
STRING: In ancient times written about in history books, people
lost a part of their civilization called “magic.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2744
STRING: It was replaced at some point by a field called “science,”
which made a fair amount of progress over many long
years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275a
STRING: But there were still many things not understood in the
world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2770
STRING: One of those things was a cheerful fairy, skilled at
singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2788
STRING: Thinking about the unknown boundaries of the world
was a boundless and ultimately futile exercise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2794
STRING: That's what I had come to think these days.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27b0
STRING: Then, my usual interaction with Phorni finished, and the
day came to a close.
